name: SlavJank Arena
description:
[DESCRIPTION]

You are in a prison. It looks and feels like home, but it has more in common with hell. You are surrounded and there is no way out, but there's no way you will go down without a fight either. Give them hell in their own universe and make it last for as long as you can. Make them pay!

Inspired by old school FPS games and the aesthetics of games developed by slavic studios in the early 2000s, AKA slavjank.

After dying you can press enter to screenshot your score, the screenshot will be stored in a folder "screenshots" which is inside the game's data folder. Share your best score on the page, there may be a prize for it!

[CONTROLS]
  • Move - WASD
  • Look - Mouse
  • Shoot - Left Click
  • Jump - Space
  • Reload - R
  • Dash - Left Shift
  • Switch Weapon - Q
[CREDITS]
  • Animation: Mixamo
  • Models: Unity Asset Store and TurboSquid
  • Textures: Texture Haven
  • Sounds: FreeSound
  • Everything else was done by me

This is my first time doing a game jam go easy on me lol

[CONTACT]
